text:
As the org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender class is now a wrapper around the 
real appender it does not inherit the threshold property from AppenderSkeleton 
which leads to failure to set the threshold level from a config file.
creator: andy.mcbride@dsl.pipex.com

patch to pass the threshold set call to the wrapped appender

text:
Created attachment 17550
restore ability to set threshold, encoding and immediateFlush property support

This patch restores the ability to set the threshold, encoding and
immediateFlush properties on the the org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender
wrapper.
